games.battleship.model

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • games.battleship.model.Ship

  • public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
    The class ship represents a ship of battleship game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ship(ShipType type, ShipOrientation orientation, ShipPosition startPosition)
      Ship is instantiated by providing its type, orientation and position.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ShipPosition getEndPosition()
      Returns end position of ship on player's board.
      ShipOrientation getOrientation()
      Returns orientation of ship.
      ShipPosition getStartPosition()
      Returns start position of ship on player's board.
      ShipType getType()
      Returns type of ship.
      void hit()
      Ship has attribute health.
      boolean isDestroyed()
      Ship has attribute health.
      boolean isPresentOnPosition(int x, int y)
      Returns true if ship is present on given coordinate false otherwise.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • isPresentOnPosition

        public boolean isPresentOnPosition(int x,
                                   int y)
        Returns true if ship is present on given coordinate false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        Returns:
        true if ship is present on given coordinate false otherwise.

      • hit

        public void hit()
        Ship has attribute health. Health is initialized to length of ship (For e.g, DESTROYER is of length 3). This method decreases heath of ship.

      • isDestroyed

        public boolean isDestroyed()
        Ship has attribute health. Health is initialized to length of ship (For e.g, DESTROYER is of length 3). Ship is considered destroyed if its health is 0.
